unit.utterance: Yek mardi rafte bud bālāye deraxt dašt golābi mičid
unit.utterance_translation: There was a man on the tree picking pears

unit.utterance: dar hāle čidane golābi bud ke yek dāneaš mioftad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: One of the pears falls down while he was up there

unit.utterance: tuye sabadhā nemioftad bad az nardebān miāyad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: not in the basket, he climbes down the ladder

unit.utterance: mivehāyi ke tuye pirāhanaš rixte bud mirizad tuye sabad
unit.utterance_translation: put the pears in his cloth into the basket

unit.utterance: bad āni ke oftāde bud pāyin rā migirad tamizaš mikonad
unit.utterance_translation: then picks up the one which was on the ground, cleans it

unit.utterance: ān ham migozārad tuye sabad dobāre miravad bālā ke bečinad
unit.utterance_translation: puts it in the basket too and goes up the tree again to continue picking

unit.utterance: Yek dočarxesavār dāšt rad mišod mibinad :p ānjā yek sabad golābi ast
unit.utterance_translation: a bike was passing by and sees the pears' basket

unit.utterance: ān rā migirad migozarad ruye čarxaš savār mišavad miravad
unit.utterance_translation: he takes it, puts it on his bike, gets on it and rides away

unit.utterance: bad haminjuri ke dar hāle raftan ast doxtari rā mibinad bā dočarxe dārad rad mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: on his way, he sees a girl with another bike who is passing

unit.utterance: yek lahze ke negāhaš mikonad yek sangi tuye jade bude bad mixorad zamin
unit.utterance_translation: he looks at her for a moment, his bike hit a stone which was on the road, and falls down

unit.utterance: bad čand tā miāyand, čand nafar nemidānam dustānaš budand dāštand bāzi mikardand ānjā miāyand komak=aš mikonand
unit.utterance_translation: then there come a few boys maybe his friends I don't know, they were playing and they come to help him

unit.utterance: bad golābihāyaš rā jam mikonand migozārand ruye čarxaš dobāre vaqti dāšt miraft kolāhaš mānde bud ruye zamin
unit.utterance_translation: they gathers up the pears, put them into the basket on the bike, and when the boy was about to leave, his hat was left on the ground

unit.utterance: sedāyaš mikonand kolāhaš rā ham beheš midahand
unit.utterance_translation: they calls him and they gave him back his hat

unit.utterance: šoru mikonad dobāre raftan bad ān čand nafari ke pesar rā komakaš kardand dāštand az zire hamān deraxt miraftand
unit.utterance_translation: he left, and the boys who helped him were passing under the same tree

unit.utterance: bad hamān lahze ān mard az deraxt miāyad pāyin mibinad yeki az sabadhāyaš kam ast nist
unit.utterance_translation: at the same time the man climbes down the tree and found out that one of the baskets is not there

unit.utterance: ānhā rā čap čap negāh mikonad dobāre behešān šak mikonad ehsās kardam masalan fekr mikonad ke kāre ānhāst
unit.utterance_translation: he looked at them angrily, and suspects that they have stolen the pears.
